subject: RE: [junit] Re: Help plz...
msgSnippet: ... i wouldn t think so either, i just thought i would see what the test did. ... excellent idea!, i did, now the short names are a bit faster on the slak box.
messageBody:
At 09:15 AM 9/25/03 +0200, you wrote:
>Ray Tayek wrote:
>
> > a simple test seems to indicate no difference using 1.4.1_01-b-1, mixed ...
>
>First, I don't think that the names of *local variables* have any impact
>in java.

i wouldn't think so either, i just thought i would see what the test did.

>...
>Second, you should always also switch the two implementations.

excellent idea!, i did, now the short names are a bit faster on the slak box.

thanks
